title: Store Map App
text: package implements R Shiny application, showcasing interactive map functionality using R Leaflet package.

title: Store Map App
text: can install development version storeMap GitHub : NOTE: ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy .

title: Store Map App
text: app can published central server (Shiny Server, Posit Connect etc.) using top-level ‘app.R’ file.

title: Store/Competitor Associations — assoc_store_comp
text: table linkages TWM non-TWM locations, defining directed 'associations' .

title: Store/Competitor Associations — assoc_store_comp
text: data frame 1834 rows 4 columns: assoc_key (integer) unique association id store_key (integer) unique store id comp_key (integer) unique competitor id is_primary (logical) indicates whether association maintained high priority

title: Banner Colors — banner_colors
text: lookup table RGB color values associated non-TWM parent companies.

title: Banner Colors — banner_colors
text: data frame 348 rows 2 columns: banner (character) name competitor's parent company color (character) RGB color code
